title: Bihar Sub Inspector Exam Syllabus 2024
author: Anand kumar
paragraphs: This syllabus outlines the key topics and concepts that will be covered in the Bihar Police Sub-Inspector (SI) recruitment exam 2024. It is designed to provide a comprehensive overview of the subject matter and help students prepare effectively for the written examination.

Students are advised to thoroughly review all the listed topics and consult official sources like the Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) website for the latest syllabus and exam pattern. The weightage for each section might vary depending on the notification.
Additional resources and practice materials can be found online and through coaching institutes.

tables.title: Possible Subjects (Written Exam)
rows: Logical Reasoning, Analytical Reasoning, Verbal Reasoning

tables.title: Additional Information
rows: May be conducted after the written exam. Refer to official notification for details.
Successful candidates will undergo a medical examination.
